name: Empty Bottle
description:
This prototype game was concepted and created in 7 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student devs at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University.

In a happy land where all citizens are bottles filled with water of different colors. A bottle goes through different affection to find his "the one", a leaking tea cup.

Credits:

Game Design &Scripting Qiao Wang

Art &Animation Lifu Li

Sound design Ara Manassyan & Chelsea Sparks

Music Emily Ann Dawson
